mapper.select: select top (convert(int,#{rows})) temp.* from ( select row_number() over (order by c.create_time desc) as RowNumber,c.*,ct.name ctname from app_courses c left join app_courses_type ct on c.courses_type_id=ct.id where 1=1 ) as temp where RowNumber > convert(int,#{rows})*(convert(int,#{page})-1) order by temp.create_time desc

select ch.id chapter_id,ch.title chapter_title,cr.content,cr.id from app_chapter ch left join app_courses_chapter cc on ch.id=cc.chapter_id left join app_courses cr on cc.courses_id=cr.id where 1=1
and cr.id=#{course_id}

select cl.id class_id,cl.title class_title,cl.class_url,cl.time class_time from app_class cl left join app_chapter_class chl on cl.id=chl.class_id where 1=1
and chl.chapter_id=#{chapter_id}
select count(*) from app_courses_user cu where cu.courses_id=#{courses_id} and cu.user_id=#{user_id} and cu.type=#{type}
